name: Television Transmotion || GameJam Brackey_2020-1
description:
Welcome to my Submission for the 2020-1 Gamejam from Brackeys.

if you have trouble with a level or dont know where to go try to interact with the things that standout and keep shooting at everything red. even if it takes a while every red target should turn green

This is my first game ever i have been programming and prototyping stuff but nothing to big atleast nothing compared to this.

it is still in WIP

so if you find any Bugs pls @ me  in the Brackeys Discord and tell me about it.

Controls (IMPORTANT!):

Moving:W|A|S|D

Running: Left Shift

Interact : F

PauseMenu: P or ESC

Switching Channels:Q and E

Teleporting to selected Dimension: R

Shooting: Left Mouse

Zooming: Right Mouse
